Если в Deathmatch: Source сидят в основном жёсткие олдскульные з.дроты, которым трудно навязать бой, то здесь же сидят простые смертные. Онлайн здесь практически никакой, но это не значит, что поиграть не получится.

[h1]Описание:[/h1]
Сетевой шутер от первого лица 2001 года выпуска являющийся модом для "Half Life". Что будет если соединить динамичный "Quake" с брутальным "Half Life"- получится "Deathmatch Classic". Бегаем, прыгаем, стреляем, уничтожаем соперников. Умерли? Через секунду в новый бой. Классика режима деадматч. А эта карта Crossfire... Я даже спустя 15 лет после последнего запуска игры с удовольствием утонул в ней с головой... В воскресный вечер было замечено пять живых игроков, но зайдя в будний день не одного. Только спустя 15 минут игры присоединился один, за ним еще один и еще один. Не густо, но играть можно. Это лучший мод после "Counter Strike". Рекомендую вечерком с друзьями пострелять ради фана.

[h1]Послесловие:[/h1]
Если вам понравился этот обзор добро пожаловать в группу
http://steamcommunity.com/groups/uojer - тут вы сможете увидеть рекомендованные мною игры, другие обзоры, а также просто пообщаться в хорошей компании.

Deathmatch Classic (DMC) me parece un buen juego solo que sufre de lo mismo que sufre richochet, la gente ya no lo juega, es un juego al estilo de Quake con el motor grafico de half life incluso en la descripcion del juego dice que es un homenaje a id software (Compañia encargada de Quake), Muy rara vez me encontre con una o dos personas, lo poco que jugue lo hize en servidores con bots, Como lo dije al principio DMC me parece bueno solo que carece de jugadores, creo que si el juego fuera gratis hubiera muchos mas jugadores activos pero a la fecha de publicacion de este analisis el juego esta a la venta.
Barely anyone plays this anymore

I played it, it's fun, I can't deny.

But... there are no players in the servers. I don't see a reason to buy this game today (luckily I got it on a big sale, otherwise, I would absolutely have never bought it).

If you have some friends to play with you you can be happy, otherwise... I already said.
This is what you get when you combine Quake, Team Fortress Classic, and Half-Life.
This game is so fun, but you are more likely to find a life on mars that find a server with living human souls to play with.

Im sure it would be fun, but it's completely dead. there are limited maps and weapons, and the only thing you can do is play locally, in which case I can't recommend it unless the price goes down. I know that it might be more fun if I had played quake, back in the day, but I didn't, and I don't think that the nostalgic feel makes up for the game being dead and having nothing to do in it.

[h1] Deathmatch Classic (DMC) [/h1]
As the name suggests it has no story or campaign but for a game like this its not needed there is just one game mode known as Deathmatch.This game was born as a result of fusion between Quake's [b] Quake Engine [/b] and Half-Life's [b] GoldSrc Engine [/b] . In fact GoldSrc was born as a result of Quake Engine.Valve developed this game to show their appreciation for [b] ID Software [/b] and this masterpiece was born

[h1] Review [/h1]
This game is EXTREMELY FUN TO PLAY alone or with friends.It is kind of overpriced but still a good game to play nonetheless.Anyway will list pros and cons below

[u] Pros: [/u]
+Decent Graphics
+Decent Gameplay
+Variety of weapons
+Fun to play

[u] Cons: [/u]
-Game is dead (Almost...)
-Not much servers
-Overpriced
-A little buggy

This game is a masterpiece if the cons listed above are dealt with
Lohnt sich nicht viel zu alt

Basically Quake by Valve that you get with the Valve Complete Pack. Bit of fun for a little while but the community is more dead than Ricochet, another Valve game that comes with the Valve Complete Pack.

Basically don't buy unless you bought Valve Complete Pack. Sure it's a bit of fun but the community is sooo dead I simply cannot recommend actually buying the game for $0.99 on sale unless you're getting it with the Valve Complete Pack which is excellent value.
